entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Teslin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Teslin Airport 9:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
